ext_description.p: Probability is mapped to , with the probability_value being given through a value_representation_item. In the case of a Probability_derived, the list of parameters is provided through a compound_representation_item.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A probability_generator is a sub-type of which can be used to calulated a probability value given the appropriate set of paramater values. The use of a subtype ensures that the only representations that can be referenced from a derived probability are those generate probability values.
